text: @Shawhelp Rep on Chat was zero help. Directed me to contact the @NHL for a refund for a service that I pay Shaw for? Makes no sense. Webpage the rep told me to visit isn’t even an active webpage, returns a 404 error. Also told me season isn’t over even though it is. Not impressed
